title: Kids Games (Game Pack) (January 18 2014)
description:
Maze - Unsafe Mine
The goal in Maze Unsafe Mine is to get past a level before the timer runs out and try to get as many points as you can. This version has ten levels each getting harder as you go. Remember to get the lights. You can control the game 2 ways. 1. Using the keyboard [W,S,A,D] keys and the mouse. 2. Uses a Xbox 360 controller. 

Lucky Farm
Match cards before the timer runs out and don't waste to many remaining turns. This game is a great way to test your kids memory speed and recall limits as they have fun matching cows, pigs, and other animals in 20 levels that change each time the game is played. 

Manic Matching
Match cards before the timer runs out and don't waste to many turns. This game is a great way to test your memory speed and recall limits.

Hunger Man - 0.9 Beta
Pac-man like game with a online scoreboard.
